name: skypark
description: Digital platform for Sky Park entertainment centers

scripts.build: powershell -Command "Set-Location packages/shared; npm run build; Set-Location ../../apps/web; npm run build"
scripts.build:netlify: powershell -Command "Set-Location packages/shared; npm run build; Set-Location ../../apps/web; npm run build:netlify"
scripts.type-check: powershell -Command "Set-Location packages/shared; npm run build; Set-Location ../../apps/web; npm run type-check"
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec postgres psql -U skypark_user -d skypark_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/migrations/001_initial_schema.up.sql
scripts.db:rollback: docker compose exec postgres psql -U skypark_user -d skypark_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/migrations/001_initial_schema.down.sql
scripts.db:shell: docker compose exec postgres psql -U skypark_user -d skypark_db
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down postgres; docker volume rm skypark_postgres_data; docker compose up -d postgres

author: Sky Park Development Team
